description:
Ronaldo`s editor wants the manuscript for the second volume of The War Chronicles of Ronaldo, but Ronaldo isn`t done yet.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Assault! Mr. Fukuma / Falling Like Flowers in Shin-Yokohama / Can a Bang on the Wall Kill Him?
Fukuma à l`attaque ! / Shin-Yokohama sous les fleurs / Toi, me tuer d`un coup dans le mur ?
Shuugeki!! Fukuma-san / Shin-Yokohama ni Hana to Chiruramu / Kabe o Tataite Koroseru ka
襲撃!! フクマさん / 新横浜に花と散るらむ / 壁を叩いて殺せるか
